skill.data.offering.name: Offering
skill.data.offering.combo: The default action of one Starter Card gives +2 instead of +1. Any other (non-wounds) card will give +3 instead
skill.data.offering.combo.starter: The <style="status">default</style> action of one <style="status">Starter</style> Card gives <style="value">+2</style> instead of <style="value">+1</style>
skill.data.offering.combo.non_starter: The <style="status">default</style> action of one <style="status">Non-Starter</style> Card gives <style="value">+3</style> instead of <style="value">+1</style>
